ExportWeapons.description: For Orokin-era smugglers, this fearsome handheld shotgun was a favored tool for 'dispute resolution'.
ExportWeapons.name: Mara Detron

ExportWeapons.description: Forged from raw prisma crystals and infused with Void energy, this blade's pristine edge is honed razor-sharp to eviscerate even the most deadly of foes.
ExportWeapons.name: Prisma Skana

ExportWeapons.description: Encased in plates refined from pure prisma crystals, this rare element gives this assault rifle a radiant luster.
ExportWeapons.name: Prisma Grakata

ExportWeapons.description: An ancient weapon designed by the Entrati. Primary fire siphons life essence from the target to fuel a devastating secondary fire. A heavy, oversized automatic rifle with withering fire that delivers rapid heat damage. Secondary fire unleashes an arcing projectile that ricochets off surfaces and enemies, exploding on every impact.
ExportWeapons.name: Trumna

ExportWeapons.description: An ancient weapon designed by the Entrati. Primary fire siphons life essence from the target to fuel a devastating secondary fire. This large, weighty double-barreled pistol delivers twin projectiles that pack a punch, exploding on impact. Secondary fire puts the weapon in lock-on mode. Aim to lock onto multiple targets, then fire to unleash homing projectiles.
ExportWeapons.name: Sepulcrum

ExportWeapons.description: Albrecht's Void experiments revealed the true destructive potential of this weapon. In Incarnon form, draw in ambient power to deal steadily increased damage to enemies. At full power, release a blast of <DT_FIRE_COLOR>Heat.
ExportWeapons.name: Onos

ExportWeapons.description: Wield the timeless power of this mighty hammer. Heavy Attacks performed with Ekhein temporarily increase its Damage and Attack Speed.
ExportWeapons.name: Ekhein

ExportWeapons.description: Albrecht's Void experiments revealed the true destructive potential of this fist weapon. In Incarnon form, perform Heavy Slams to impale nearby enemies with spikes.
ExportWeapons.name: Ruvox

ExportWeapons.description: During parades and victory marches, the Laetum fired pigmented airburst rounds that rained onto festive crowds. The Orokin sent Laetum with the Zariman so they could properly celebrate a successful maiden voyage to Tau. There would be no such celebration, but the Void imbued the Laetum with a much more explosive capacity.
ExportWeapons.name: Laetum

ExportWeapons.description: Orokin elites admired farmers in conquered regions, because they had learned to fight with modified farming tools despite being forbidden to own weapons. For their voyage, the Zariman were presented with Praedos in recognition of Zariman tenacity. The Void reinforces the strength of the spirited individual by fortifying the Praedos.
ExportWeapons.name: Praedos

ExportWeapons.description: In the early Orokin Empire, elites wore Innodem as a symbolic reminder to defend the defenseless. The tradition fell out of style, but nostalgic elites acknowledged the sentiment in the form of a gift. The Void amplifies that ideal. Void energy strengthens Innodem gliding aerial attacks and the wielder is increasingly resilient as they perform finisher attacks in Incarnon Form.
ExportWeapons.name: Innodem

ExportWeapons.description: Zariman colonists originally intended to use the Phenmor in burial rites. In Orokin society, the higher the rank, the greater number of volleys for the deceased. Its stock is carved from Phenaureus Pine, a tree designed to release seedlings only onto scorched earth. In the hands of the Void, the Phenmor becomes darkly aggressive.
ExportWeapons.name: Phenmor

ExportWeapons.description: The Felarx invokes ancient times when aristocrats hunted game. For ceremonies, Orokin elites bred creatures reminiscent of game birds to reanimate cultural myths. They gave the Zariman crew Felarx and a brace of birds as a sign of acceptance into elite society. The brace of birds becomes a pair of pistols at the hands of the Void.
ExportWeapons.name: Felarx

ExportWeapons.description: As an alternative to Kunai, these Tenno throwing stars do cause less Damage but they come with expanded Ammo Capacity and a higher Fire Rate.
ExportWeapons.name: Hikou

ExportWeapons.description: Used by The Stalker, Despair throwing blades have a mono-filament edge, sharp enough to penetrate a Warframe.
ExportWeapons.name: Despair

ExportWeapons.description: Kunai throwing daggers offer a silent alternative to the traditional side arm. Perfect for assassins.
ExportWeapons.name: Kunai

ExportWeapons.description: The claws of these tactical bombs dig into the target and detonate on command.
ExportWeapons.name: Talons

ExportWeapons.description:
In moments of despair, let the battle resonate with song. Cantare's blades lodge into the battlefield and return upon reload. When returning blades strike enemies, Cantare empowers allies with increased Reload Speed.

Experience the true power of Jade’s Ensemble when Evensong, Cantare, and Harmony sing together.
ExportWeapons.name: Cantare

ExportWeapons.description: The remotely triggered Castanas quietly deliver a lethal dose of electricity to unsuspecting enemies.
ExportWeapons.name: Castanas

ExportWeapons.description: As deadly as any bullet without the associated noise or commotion.
ExportWeapons.name: Hikou Prime

ExportWeapons.description: These rare, braided throwing daggers were a favorite tool of high ranking Orokin assassins.
ExportWeapons.name: Spira Prime

ExportWeapons.description: A flash of red ribbon is the last thing most victims of these throwing-daggers see.
ExportWeapons.name: Spira

ExportWeapons.description: Silently lacerate enemies with Gara's signature glass throwing knives. Increased Projectile Speed when wielded by Gara.
ExportWeapons.name: Fusilai

ExportWeapons.description: A different take on a familiar shotgun, the Strun Wraith features unique styling.
ExportWeapons.name: Strun Wraith

ExportWeapons.description: The Strun is a standard shotgun. Reliable, versatile and deadly.
ExportWeapons.name: Strun

ExportWeapons.description: The Hek is a powerful shotgun that fires its shots with a tight spread, making it efficient at medium range as long as its strong recoil is properly managed.
ExportWeapons.name: Hek

ExportWeapons.description: One of the finest examples of Tenno craftsmanship, the Boar Prime offers a higher Fire Rate, Magazine Capacity and a much higher per-shot damage.
ExportWeapons.name: Boar Prime

ExportWeapons.description: A shotgun with low accuracy and strong recoil, but able to deliver its payload in full-auto. The Boar is best used at close range.
ExportWeapons.name: Boar

ExportWeapons.description: Sobek is a rapid-firing Grineer shotgun that has reduced damage per shot but boasts extra large magazine capacity.
ExportWeapons.name: Sobek

ExportWeapons.description: A customized version of the elusive Snipetron, with metallic finish and Lotus decal.
ExportWeapons.name: Snipetron Vandal

ExportWeapons.description: A special version of the standard Braton rifle with a slower Fire Rate but offering higher accuracy and damage values. The Braton Vandal has been customized by the Tenno with a blue-green metallic finish and Lotus branding on the grips.
ExportWeapons.name: Braton Vandal

ExportWeapons.description: A classic Tenno sniper rifle, the Vectis is ideal for ranged takedowns.
ExportWeapons.name: Vectis

ExportWeapons.description: Accuracy coupled with a massive magazine makes the Soma assault rifle a formidable weapon.
ExportWeapons.name: Soma

ExportWeapons.description: The MK1-Braton is the standard issue rifle for all Tenno. A versatile weapon that can be customized to support a wide variety of play styles.
ExportWeapons.name: MK1-Braton

ExportWeapons.description: Manufactured by the Corpus, the Snipetron is a powerful and accurate rifle that sports optical zoom capabilities. Perfect for long range engagements.
ExportWeapons.name: Snipetron

ExportWeapons.description: The Latron is a highly efficient rifle that performs well at medium and at long range, its accuracy making it a deadly weapon in the hands of skilled marksmen.
ExportWeapons.name: Latron

ExportWeapons.description: The Braton's high rate of fire and accuracy make it a favorite among the Tenno.
ExportWeapons.name: Braton

ExportWeapons.description: The ornamental Latron Prime exploits ancient Orokin technology to get a slight damage increase over the standard Latron.
ExportWeapons.name: Latron Prime

ExportWeapons.description: The Gorgon sports a large magazine that allows it to provide suppressing fire and sustain a high damage rate over a long time. Its high Fire Rate is only achieved following a short wind-up cycle.
ExportWeapons.name: Gorgon

ExportWeapons.description: The Burston fires 3-round bursts, which provides a balance between the lethality of automatic rifles and the accuracy of semi-automatic rifles.
ExportWeapons.name: Burston

ExportWeapons.description: A classic Orokin weapon, Braton Prime features modified damage levels and a larger magazine over the standard model.
ExportWeapons.name: Braton Prime

ExportWeapons.description: The Boltor fires slow, heavy bolts that are capable of impaling enemies to walls.
ExportWeapons.name: Boltor

ExportWeapons.description: Launch a volley of virulent, hyper-pressurized, water globules that envelope targets and explode with torrential force. Yareli's signature pistol.
ExportWeapons.name: Kompressa

ExportWeapons.description: Sevagoth's wrist-mounted sidearm fires a chilling slow-moving slab, guaranteed to slow enemies for easier marksmanship. Charge the shot to fire a punishing high-velocity, high critical chance slab that punches through barriers. Deals additional headshot damage in Sevagoth's hands.
ExportWeapons.name: Epitaph

ExportWeapons.description: Ring the death knell. Headshots briefly turn this scoped pistol into a rapid-fire, Critical Damage fiend that uses no ammo. When used by Harrow, Knell has a 2-round mag.
ExportWeapons.name: Knell

ExportWeapons.description: With a high fire rate, ammo efficiency and rapid reload when emptied, this unusual sidearm can hand out carnage all day long. Ammo efficiency is further increased when Protea uses this, her signature weapon.
ExportWeapons.name: Velox

ExportWeapons.description: Reverse-engineered from propulsion tech this hand-cannon packs a kick. Weak Point kills trigger Overdrive, locking off secondary functions while maximizing your fire rate and ammo efficiency for a short time.
ExportWeapons.name: Athodai

ExportWeapons.description: Fires razor-sharp darts that anchor themselves in their target before erupting in a plume of toxic gas.
ExportWeapons.name: Zakti

ExportWeapons.description: Octavia's pistol hammers foes with single shots or a rapid volley of bullets. When wielded by Octavia, alt-fire Headshot Kills increase Reload Speed.
ExportWeapons.name: Pandero

ExportWeapons.description: The design of these hard-hitting dual pistols is a mix of organic and bladed elements.
ExportWeapons.name: Akjagara

ExportWeapons.description: These diminutive rapid-fire Stiletto machine-pistols are just the right size to be akimbo style without sacrificing accuracy.
ExportWeapons.name: Akstiletto

ExportWeapons.description: This intricate automatic pistol is able to fire its magazine which then spins in the air for a short time, firing lasers at nearby enemies.
ExportWeapons.name: Azima

ExportWeapons.description: The devastating power of the Soma rifle compacted into two elegant pistols.
ExportWeapons.name: Aksomati

ExportWeapons.description: Chew through the enemy with this vicious automatic hand shotgun.
ExportWeapons.name: Pyrana

ExportWeapons.description: Bombard legions of enemies with target seeking rockets. These dual launchers reload faster while sprinting, even more so in Gauss’ hands. Rockets arm after reaching a safe distance.
ExportWeapons.name: Akarius

ExportWeapons.description: Heat, cold, electricity, or toxin: choose an element and launch a flurry of deadly quills. This versatile sidearm is Khora’s signature weapon and has a chance to instantly reload after headshots when she wields it.
ExportWeapons.name: Hystrix

ExportWeapons.description: A lightweight weapon that packs a punch worthy of its golden design.
ExportWeapons.name: Zylok Prime

ExportWeapons.description: A thousand pains, before their end.
ExportWeapons.name: Zakti Prime

ExportWeapons.description: This sidearm’s circular design evokes Protea Prime’s perception of time.
ExportWeapons.name: Velox Prime

ExportWeapons.description: This elegant rapid-fire revolver is the embodiment of superior Orokin craftsmanship.
ExportWeapons.name: Vasto Prime

ExportWeapons.description: Orokin craftsmanship married with superior firepower. Dual Vastos, primed and ready to strike.
ExportWeapons.name: Akvasto Prime

ExportWeapons.description: The Sicarus Prime is an ornamental firearm that fires rounds in rapid bursts, providing a balance between the lethality of auto-pistols and the accuracy of semi-automatic pistols.
ExportWeapons.name: Sicarus Prime

ExportWeapons.description: Three kills in rapid succession to summon a second ethereal Pyrana for twice the deadly punch.
ExportWeapons.name: Pyrana Prime

ExportWeapons.description: Pound the beat for a dance of death with Octavia's signature prime pistol.
ExportWeapons.name: Pandero Prime

ExportWeapons.description: Orokin elegance meets formidable stopping power in this exquisite revolver. Hits have a chance to maximize Ammo Efficiency for a few seconds.
ExportWeapons.name: Magnus Prime

ExportWeapons.description: The Lex Prime is a powerful, accurate pistol that has a low Fire Rate and Magazine Capacity. Very efficient at long range.
ExportWeapons.name: Lex Prime

ExportWeapons.description: Glinting like a golden dawn, Yareli Prime’s signature pistol engulfs foes in a cascade of virulent, explosive, water globules. None can escape the sea.
ExportWeapons.name: Kompressa Prime

ExportWeapons.description: Ring a funeral toll upon enemy skulls with Harrow Prime's signature pistol.
ExportWeapons.name: Knell Prime

ExportWeapons.description: Versatile weapons complement deadly hunters. Khora Prime’s signature pistol rotates through hot, cold, electric, and toxic quills. When equipped on Khora, Hystrix Prime has a chance to instantly reload after headshots.
ExportWeapons.name: Hystrix Prime

ExportWeapons.description: Send shivers down your enemies' spines with this wrist-mounted sidearm. As the signature weapon of Sevagoth Prime, it deals additional headshot damage when wielded by him.
ExportWeapons.name: Epitaph Prime

ExportWeapons.description: The beauty of this luxuriously gilded crossbow cannot obscure its lethal purpose.
ExportWeapons.name: Ballistica Prime

ExportWeapons.description: Stylish, discreet and accurate, perfect for the Tenno of distinction.
ExportWeapons.name: Akstiletto Prime

ExportWeapons.description: The elegant Aksomati precisely refined to this, their ultimate manifestation.
ExportWeapons.name: Aksomati Prime

ExportWeapons.description: Precision machined mirrored pistols. Primed and ready.
ExportWeapons.name: Akjagara Prime

ExportWeapons.description: Gilded rails adorn these two vicious bolt launching pistols.
ExportWeapons.name: Akbolto Prime

ExportWeapons.description: Wield a golden pair of rocket launchers. Sprint to reload them faster. They reload fastest when wielded by Gauss.
ExportWeapons.name: Akarius Prime

ExportWeapons.description: Vanquish chaos with dual firepower.
ExportWeapons.name: Afuris Prime

ExportWeapons.description: The versatile Magnus revolver is a lethal sidearm for any Tenno.
ExportWeapons.name: Magnus

ExportWeapons.description: The choice weapon of Mirage, these fast-firing dual pistols deliver a deadly performance.
ExportWeapons.name: Akzani

ExportWeapons.description: A gift from the Lotus to commemorate the anniversary of the first Tenno waking from Cryo stasis.
ExportWeapons.name: Dex Furis

ExportWeapons.description: Hammer the enemy with this light-bodied heavy hitter. Featuring a double-action trigger that fires hard and fast.
ExportWeapons.name: Zylok

ExportWeapons.description: The Ballistica crossbow features a unique dual firing mechanism. Choose between a four bolt volley or a deadly accurate charged shot.
ExportWeapons.name: Ballistica

ExportWeapons.description: Banshee Prime’s signature shotgun is an instrument of devastation that fires both focused and broad shots.
ExportWeapons.name: Euphona Prime

ExportWeapons.description: Never stop fighting, never run out of ammo. Temple’s signature machine pistol was modified by Albrecht Entrati to warp fired bullets back into the magazine when reloaded.
ExportWeapons.name: Riot-848

ExportWeapons.description: Steady and reliable, the Vasto revolver combines speed and power for a classic gunslinger feel.
ExportWeapons.name: Vasto

ExportWeapons.description: The Lato is a highly accurate pistol used by the Tenno everywhere.
ExportWeapons.name: Lato

ExportWeapons.description: A special version of the standard Lato pistol with a slower Fire Rate but offering higher Accuracy and Damage values. The Lato Vandal has been customized by the Tenno with a blue-green metallic finish and Lotus branding on the grips.
ExportWeapons.name: Lato Vandal

ExportWeapons.description: The Lato is a highly accurate pistol used by the Tenno everywhere. Prime model offers slightly increased damage.
ExportWeapons.name: Lato Prime

ExportWeapons.description: The Lex is a powerful, accurate pistol that has a low Fire Rate and Magazine Capacity. Very efficient at long range.
ExportWeapons.name: Lex

ExportWeapons.description: The Bronco is a small-scale shotgun that can be wielded with one hand. Only effective at close range, it has a limited Magazine Capacity.
ExportWeapons.name: Bronco

ExportWeapons.description: The Bolto fires slow, heavy bolts that are capable of impaling enemies to walls.
ExportWeapons.name: Bolto

ExportWeapons.description: The Sicarus fires 3-round bursts, which provides a balance between the lethality of auto-pistols and the accuracy of semi-automatic pistols.
ExportWeapons.name: Sicarus

ExportWeapons.description: Infused with rare Orokin alloys, the Bronco Prime is a highly efficient weapon, trading an increased Magazine Capacity and damage for a lower rate of fire.
ExportWeapons.name: Bronco Prime

ExportWeapons.description: The Furis delivers a high damage output in a short time frame thanks to its high rate of fire.
ExportWeapons.name: Furis

ExportWeapons.description: Lacerate attackers with two razor sharp warfans.
ExportWeapons.name: Gunsen

ExportWeapons.description: Unfurl this warfan like a rapidly waxing moon.
ExportWeapons.name: Vericres

ExportWeapons.description: Flick away the enemy with this heavy warfan. The Quassus scatters ethereal daggers that are even more deadly accurate when wielded by Xaku.
ExportWeapons.name: Quassus

ExportWeapons.description: Wield Xaku Prime’s elegant fan, its gilded edges crafted for both precision and prestige.
ExportWeapons.name: Quassus Prime

ExportWeapons.description: Command the beauty and lethality of these ornate warfans.
ExportWeapons.name: Gunsen Prime

ExportWeapons.description: Ancient blades, perfected for today’s combat.
ExportWeapons.name: Kronen Prime

ExportWeapons.description: The Kronen resurrects a lethal fighting style once thought lost to the ages.
ExportWeapons.name: Kronen

ExportWeapons.description: An intimidating Tonfa set designed to match the briary design of the Boltor.
ExportWeapons.name: Boltace

ExportWeapons.description: Argo & Vel bolster the warrior who stands fast. Its Heavy Attack sends forth a glaive that ricochets off enemies.
ExportWeapons.name: Argo & Vel

ExportWeapons.description: Deadly slashes from the Sigma sword are matched only by the force of the Octantis shield when thrown from the air.
ExportWeapons.name: Sigma & Octantis

ExportWeapons.description: Punish those who test your restraint. The first strike in a combo stuns enemies when Cobra & Crane Prime are wielded by Baruuk.
ExportWeapons.name: Cobra & Crane Prime

ExportWeapons.description: Baruuk's signature weapons: a sword for retribution, a shield for restraint. In Baruuk's hands, and his hands only, Cobra's first strike in a combo renders his foe unconscious.
ExportWeapons.name: Cobra & Crane

ExportWeapons.description: Take active defense to new heights with this deadly flying shield and brutal blade. Throw the shield with a unique Heavy Attack, inflicting Blast Status Effects and dealing damage in a wide area.
ExportWeapons.name: Tak & Lug

ExportWeapons.description: This fiery sword and shield combination perfects the balance of Tenno offense and defense prowess. In the hands of a Master, even a defensive tool like a shield can be used as a weapon.
ExportWeapons.name: Silva & Aegis

ExportWeapons.description: Forged of steel grafted from Umbra's flesh, this elegant Nikana unites with its Warframe to form a single being of seething purpose.
ExportWeapons.name: Skiajati

ExportWeapons.description: Elevate martial combat into an art form with this Tenno rapier.
ExportWeapons.name: Destreza

ExportWeapons.description: Fearsome and noble, the elegant two-handed Nikana is the pride of any Arsenal. Kills build charges and seeking projectiles are unleashed with a Slide Attack to find and stun unwitting enemies. When Revenant wields this blade, Tatsu’s charge cap is increased.
ExportWeapons.name: Tatsu

ExportWeapons.description: The steel flag of Old War Railjack crews, the Pennant was invaluable in repelling boarders. With each heavy attack kill the Pennant's speed of attack increases.
ExportWeapons.name: Pennant

ExportWeapons.description: After 10 kills or assists, Dorrclave enters a spectral state that doubles weapon Follow Through and guarantees Status Effects for the next 10 attacks. In Dagath's hands, each active Status Effect heals her slightly.
ExportWeapons.name: Dorrclave

ExportWeapons.description: Tear and chew through enemies with this unusual crankshaft-style greatsword. When wielded by Grendel he is immune to staggers and knockdowns during heavy attacks.
ExportWeapons.name: Masseter

ExportWeapons.description: The delicate form of this Tenno rapier conceals its ferocious and resilient force.
ExportWeapons.name: Endura

ExportWeapons.description: Perforate enemies with these two needle-sharp sai.
ExportWeapons.name: Okina

ExportWeapons.description: A fragment of Stalker's War sword, a symbol of his defeat.
ExportWeapons.name: Broken War

ExportWeapons.description: The Stalker's sword as bestowed on him by the Sentient Hunhow.
ExportWeapons.name: War

ExportWeapons.description: In the practiced hands of a master, this blade and whip becomes exceedingly devastating.
ExportWeapons.name: Lacera

ExportWeapons.description: Forged for veterans of the Scarlet Spear conflict, this Lacera has been modified to enhance nimbleness and lethality.
ExportWeapons.name: Ceti Lacera

ExportWeapons.description: Tear through any target with these vicious, claw-like blades. The signature swords of Khora.
ExportWeapons.name: Dual Keres

ExportWeapons.description: Tatsu Prime glows with spectral splendor. It grows more powerful with each enemy’s demise, especially when wielded by Revenant.
ExportWeapons.name: Tatsu Prime

ExportWeapons.description: A classic Tenno blade, beautifully reimagined.
ExportWeapons.name: Pangolin Prime

ExportWeapons.description: Enforce authority with these fine-edged blades.
ExportWeapons.name: Okina Prime

ExportWeapons.description: Forged by a forgotten master, these exquisite blades are bounty from a golden-age long gone.
ExportWeapons.name: Nami Skyla Prime

ExportWeapons.description: A greatsword for those with an insatiable hunger for victory. Grendel is immune to crowd-control when he performs Heavy Attacks with this weapon.
ExportWeapons.name: Masseter Prime

ExportWeapons.description: An ancient blade predating the fall of the Orokin Empire. Forged using techniques lost over the centuries, the edge remains sharper than that of any modern Nikana.
ExportWeapons.name: Nikana Prime

ExportWeapons.description: This master blade is the heavier, oversized and far more lethal version of the signature weapon of an extinct order of Tenno assassins.
ExportWeapons.name: Karyst Prime

ExportWeapons.description: Born anew, the father of swords returns.
ExportWeapons.name: Gram Prime

ExportWeapons.description: Only Tenno were strong enough to wield this noble beast of a weapon.
ExportWeapons.name: Galatine Prime

ExportWeapons.description: The hunted will meet a quick end when faced with Khora Prime's signature swords. Heavy Attack Efficiency is enhanced when wielded by Khora.
ExportWeapons.name: Dual Keres Prime

ExportWeapons.description: An advanced blade that delivers high-damage attacks. Delivers a high percentage of critical strikes.
ExportWeapons.name: Plasma Sword

ExportWeapons.description: A unique blade used by an old Tenno clan.
ExportWeapons.name: Pangolin Sword

ExportWeapons.description: Take mastery to the next level with this primed rapier.
ExportWeapons.name: Destreza Prime

ExportWeapons.description: The sword the fabled Orokin executioner Nihil used to glass the condemned. Swing while Aim Gliding to glass enemies. A Ground Slam will smash nearby glassed foes, while sending forward a narrow shockwave to shatter distant ones. A Heavy Slam sends forth a wider shockwave with greater force.
ExportWeapons.name: Vitrica

ExportWeapons.description: Once the blade weapon of choice for an exclusive order of Tenno assassins, the Karyst dagger grew to become a symbol of honor and duty for all Tenno.
ExportWeapons.name: Karyst

ExportWeapons.description: The Dragon Nikana is forged from ancient Tenno steel. This is a master's weapon, only the most worthy of Tenno may wield it.
ExportWeapons.name: Dragon Nikana

ExportWeapons.description: The Nikana reintroduces a lost Tenno blade and with it another fragment of the old ways.
ExportWeapons.name: Nikana

ExportWeapons.description: A gift from the Lotus to commemorate the eleventh anniversary of the first Tenno waking from Cryo stasis.
ExportWeapons.name: Dex Nikana

ExportWeapons.description: A blade with a serrated edge that delivers strong quick attacks.
ExportWeapons.name: Jaw Sword

ExportWeapons.description: A strong blade capable of inflicting <DT_SLASH_COLOR>Slash Damage to its foes.
ExportWeapons.name: Heat Sword

ExportWeapons.description: With massive charged power and the ability to hit up to five foes in a single swing, the Galatine sword is the heavy artillery of Melee Weapons.
ExportWeapons.name: Galatine

ExportWeapons.description: A gift from the Lotus to commemorate the anniversary of the first Tenno waking from Cryo stasis.
ExportWeapons.name: Dex Dakra

ExportWeapons.description: Azothane calls the visionary warrior to turn the tides of battle. Block and melee attack at the same time to plunge Azothane into the ground, damaging nearby enemies with a shockwave and adding to the combo counter.
ExportWeapons.name: Azothane

ExportWeapons.description: Syam is at home in the hands of a focused warrior. Its Heavy Attacks send forth shockwaves.
ExportWeapons.name: Syam

ExportWeapons.description: Use as a devastating heavy sword or apply a Dual Melee stance and split the weapon into two ferocious blades.
ExportWeapons.name: Dark Split-Sword

ExportWeapons.description: A blade forged using dark metals, capable of delivering innate <DT_RADIATION_COLOR>Radiation Damage with attacks.
ExportWeapons.name: Dark Sword

ExportWeapons.description: Evoking the oceans of earth, this exquisite cutlass is a deadly work of art.
ExportWeapons.name: Nami Solo

ExportWeapons.description: Like the surge and crash of storm waves, a master of the Nami cutlass and Skyla dagger turns these two separate weapons into one fluid attack.
ExportWeapons.name: Nami Skyla

ExportWeapons.description: Leverage bleeding-edge Granum tech with this massive heavy blade. Slam sends forth a cascading set of three shockwaves, while Heavy Slam unleashes a swath of shockwaves.
ExportWeapons.name: Tenet Exec

ExportWeapons.description: Scorch enemies with blistering blows, or set them ablaze with the flying fire disc.
ExportWeapons.name: Zenistar

ExportWeapons.description: A two-handed, reinforced staff that can send multiple enemies airborne.
ExportWeapons.name: Bo

ExportWeapons.description: A lone Tenno once used this staff to fight back a horde of Infested.
ExportWeapons.name: Cadus

ExportWeapons.description: Fashioned with Grineer materials and balanced for marine infantry use, the Amphis is a traditional staff weapon that has received a monstrous makeover that enables shock damage on jump attacks. Connects with multiple enemies with each strike.
ExportWeapons.name: Amphis

ExportWeapons.description: With their final breath they look to the moon, and are gone.
ExportWeapons.name: Tipedo Prime

ExportWeapons.description: A classic Orokin weapon, Bo Prime creates elegant fury on the battlefield.
ExportWeapons.name: Bo Prime

ExportWeapons.description: With its crescent shaped blades flying in sweeping arcs and striking at tremendous speed, the Tipedo demands focus from those wishing to unlock its true power.
ExportWeapons.name: Tipedo

ExportWeapons.description: Razor sharp battle-hatchets, designed to compliment the Soma.
ExportWeapons.name: Dual Raza

ExportWeapons.description: Hate is a scythe with a cruel blade, wielded by The Stalker.
ExportWeapons.name: Hate

ExportWeapons.description: Reaper Prime is an ornamental scythe, with a blade forged from tempered Rubedo.
ExportWeapons.name: Reaper Prime

ExportWeapons.description: With a blade forged from the same material as the Ether Sword, the Ether Reaper delivers quick death to its victims.
ExportWeapons.name: Ether Reaper

ExportWeapons.description:
Harmony triumphs over hate. Heavy Attacks condense Status Effect damage into a single instance. Heavy Attack kills empower allies with increased Status Duration.

Experience the true power of Jade’s Ensemble when Evensong, Cantare, and Harmony sing together.
ExportWeapons.name: Harmony

ExportWeapons.description: Reap havoc with this full sized Tenno-crafted scythe.
ExportWeapons.name: Anku

ExportWeapons.description: The glorious original Orokin casting of Gara’s signature glass hammer. Deceptively light and swift, while remaining lethally effective.
ExportWeapons.name: Volnus Prime

ExportWeapons.description: Gleaming blades of white draw blood of the deepest red.
ExportWeapons.name: Venka Prime

ExportWeapons.description: As merciless and indestructible as Atlas Prime himself, Tekko Prime crush and split with tectonic force.
ExportWeapons.name: Tekko Prime

ExportWeapons.description: A perfectly crafted pairing, this mace and shield combination is sculpted for exhibition but balanced for the battlefield.
ExportWeapons.name: Silva & Aegis Prime

ExportWeapons.description: An ancient weapon imbued with a new truth.
ExportWeapons.name: Ninkondi Prime

ExportWeapons.description: Deliver a golden knockout with these prime Melee Weapons.
ExportWeapons.name: Kogake Prime

ExportWeapons.description: A beautifully forged instrument of devastation.
ExportWeapons.name: Fragor Prime

ExportWeapons.description: The sensual lines of these golden Kamas have long been celebrated as a masterwork of Tenno weapon smithing.
ExportWeapons.name: Dual Kamas Prime

ExportWeapons.description: Orthos Prime is an ancient Orokin martial weapon, forged from the purest Rubedo making it extremely light-weight.
ExportWeapons.name: Orthos Prime

ExportWeapons.description: The Tenno forged Orthos is a rare double bladed polearm. Those who take the time to master it speak of its impressive striking distance and ability to hit multiple targets.
ExportWeapons.name: Orthos

ExportWeapons.description: Light and nimble, the twin blades of this polearm will swoop and slice through throngs of hardened foes.
ExportWeapons.name: Cassowar

ExportWeapons.description: Harvest the enemy with this towering polearm.
ExportWeapons.name: Guandao

ExportWeapons.description: That a god might reap a harvest of lives.
ExportWeapons.name: Guandao Prime

ExportWeapons.description: Roll Koumei's die with every 30 hits from Amanata to empower yourself with 1 of 5 Koumei blessings. Roll a 6 to receive all blessings at once.
ExportWeapons.name: Amanata

ExportWeapons.description: During the darkest days of the Old War many a Tenno relied solely on the Tonbo to keep them alive.
ExportWeapons.name: Tonbo

ExportWeapons.description: Edun befits a dextrous warrior. Heavy Attack to throw Edun. Edun explodes after it is embedded in an enemy.
ExportWeapons.name: Edun

ExportWeapons.description: Each kill with this swooping blade adds bonus damage to the Djinn Sentinel’s next Fatal Attraction ability. In turn, Fatal Attraction bestows the weapon with a period of <DT_CORROSIVE_COLOR>Corrosive Damage.
ExportWeapons.name: Gazal Machete

ExportWeapons.description: With these blazing fast nunchaku, the enemy will never know what hit them.
ExportWeapons.name: Shaku

ExportWeapons.description: With its lightning-fast strikes, the Ninkondi pays respect to the old ways.
ExportWeapons.name: Ninkondi

ExportWeapons.description: The Magistar mace wields justice and truth in the form of bone-crushing blows.
ExportWeapons.name: Magistar

ExportWeapons.description: A basic blade known as a Skana. It is widely used by the Tenno. Prime model offers slightly increased damage.
ExportWeapons.name: Skana Prime

ExportWeapons.description: Before all other weapons, Tenno master the Skana. This simple blade becomes immensely powerful in the hands of a master. For Tenno, it is the foundation of their fighting style and a pillar of their culture.
ExportWeapons.name: Skana

ExportWeapons.description: A single blade for more precision. The Ether Sword cuts so cleanly that it was considered by the Tenno to be a more humane weapon for ‘cleansing’ infested allies.
ExportWeapons.name: Ether Sword

ExportWeapons.description: This Heavy Scythe echoes battles of another time. It is far more a weapon of sheer force than one of finesse.
ExportWeapons.name: Hespar

ExportWeapons.description: The signature weapon of the only lunatic fearsome enough to bust out of the Saturn Six Max-Pen. Once loosed this formidable throwing hammer always finds its way home.
ExportWeapons.name: Wolf Sledge

ExportWeapons.description: A large two-handed hammer, the Fragor requires great strength to wield, but impacts with enough force to send groups of enemies tumbling.
ExportWeapons.name: Fragor

ExportWeapons.description: Ice in motion can crush mountains, this frozen hammer is no different.
ExportWeapons.name: Sibear

ExportWeapons.description: Tear and maim with this agile, lightweight glass hammer. When Gara's wields her signature melee weapon, it gains additional Slam Radial Damage.
ExportWeapons.name: Volnus

ExportWeapons.description: A warrior who prefers brute force will make the most of Sampotes. Its Slams and Heavy Slams have an extended area of effect.
ExportWeapons.name: Sampotes

ExportWeapons.description: Striking with massive twin blades, the Redeemer fires the killing blow with its built-in shotgun.
ExportWeapons.name: Redeemer

ExportWeapons.description: Deal double-bladed, double-barreled death with this primed gunblade.
ExportWeapons.name: Redeemer Prime

ExportWeapons.description: Makes sweeping cuts punctuated by bursts of heavy gunfire.
ExportWeapons.name: Sarpa

ExportWeapons.description: The heavy two-handed sword known as Gram requires great strength to wield, but it is notorious for its splitting power. Can hit multiple targets with each strike.
ExportWeapons.name: Gram

ExportWeapons.description: Turn foes into puppets with Teshin’s versatile throwing disc.
ExportWeapons.name: Orvius

ExportWeapons.description: The Glaive Prime is a deadly and beautiful weapon from the Orokin era. The blades are as effective in close quarters as they are when thrown at distant enemies.
ExportWeapons.name: Glaive Prime

ExportWeapons.description: Dating back to the time of the first Tenno, the Glaive is a uniquely deadly weapon. This multi-bladed disc is not only effective for melee combat; it can also be thrown like a boomerang to cut down enemies at a distance.
ExportWeapons.name: Glaive

ExportWeapons.description: The Kestrel boomerang is a heavy throwing weapon that can knock down enemies at a distance.
ExportWeapons.name: Kestrel

ExportWeapons.description: A pair of mighty gauntlets, the Ankyros were designed by the Tenno for close quarters combat. What they lack in range they make up for in speed.
ExportWeapons.name: Ankyros

ExportWeapons.description: This Orokin variation of the Ankyros is superior to its successor in every way.
ExportWeapons.name: Ankyros Prime

ExportWeapons.description: These iron fists that rip through foes are Atlas' signature weapons. When wielded by Atlas they receive a Status Chance increase.
ExportWeapons.name: Tekko

ExportWeapons.description: These Wraith gauntlets have been augmented for power.
ExportWeapons.name: Furax Wraith

ExportWeapons.description: These power gauntlets lack the range of most Melee Weapons, but Furax is far more devastating when you strike an enemy in close combat.
ExportWeapons.name: Furax

ExportWeapons.description: A shorter Skana in each hand. Can hit multiple targets.
ExportWeapons.name: Dual Skana

ExportWeapons.description: With a Heat Sword in each hand, enemies reach their fiery demise twice as fast. Can connect with multiple targets at once.
ExportWeapons.name: Dual Heat Swords

ExportWeapons.description: Fast and precise. The Dual Ether cuts so cleanly that it was considered by the Tenno to be a more humane weapon for ‘cleansing’ infested allies. Capable of hitting multiple targets.
ExportWeapons.name: Dual Ether

ExportWeapons.description: The Kama is a Tenno style hatchet, capable of making short work of any foe.
ExportWeapons.name: Kama

ExportWeapons.description: Wielding a Kama in each hand brings a savage amount of <DT_SLASH_COLOR>Slash Damage to bear against your enemies.
ExportWeapons.name: Dual Kamas

ExportWeapons.description: A set of ceremonial daggers from the Orokin era, the Fang Prime's blades resonate violently as they strike. This allows them to pierce hardened materials like armor with ease.
ExportWeapons.name: Fang Prime

ExportWeapons.description: A shorter version of the Ether blade that allows for a more focused attack on a single target.
ExportWeapons.name: Ether Daggers

ExportWeapons.description: These matching stilettos have increased attack speed and can unleash a flurry of multi-hit attacks.
ExportWeapons.name: Fang

ExportWeapons.description: This short blade weapon forged using dark metals has limited range but comes out fast.
ExportWeapons.name: Dark Dagger

ExportWeapons.description: This short blade weapon has limited range but comes out fast and can inflict fire damage.
ExportWeapons.name: Heat Dagger

ExportWeapons.description: This short blade weapon was built using ceramic. It has limited range but comes out fast.
ExportWeapons.name: Ceramic Dagger

ExportWeapons.description: The Dakra Prime is a Tenno forged weapon, crafted during the time of the Orokin. It is renowned for speed, power and the ability to hit multiple targets.
ExportWeapons.name: Dakra Prime

ExportWeapons.description: A strong blade forged using ceramic.
ExportWeapons.name: Cronus

ExportWeapons.description: Utilizing a new fighting stance, this Tenno weapon turns fists into claws and enemies into messy piles of meat and scrap metal.
ExportWeapons.name: Venka

ExportWeapons.description: These coverings for the hands and feet allow devastating high flying hand-to-hand combat attacks without risking harm to the user.
ExportWeapons.name: Kogake

ExportWeapons.description: Mete out the sharp pain of justice. Heavy Slam attacks create a vortex that pulls in lifted enemies when the Sarofang’s Combo Multiplier builds to 8x. In Voruna’s hands, the Sarofang only requires a 5x Combo Multiplier to summon the vortex.
ExportWeapons.name: Sarofang

ExportWeapons.description: The fast and brutal Dual Ichor axes will quickly tear through enemies with a high probability of inflicting Critical Damage.
ExportWeapons.name: Dual Ichor

ExportWeapons.description: Short axes held in each hand. High attack speed and can hit multiple targets. Delivers a high percentage of critical strikes.
ExportWeapons.name: Dual Zoren

ExportWeapons.description: The Scindo is a heavy war axe crafted by the Tenno. Reduced speed and agility is balanced by heavy, devastating strikes capable of connecting with multiple targets at once.
ExportWeapons.name: Scindo

ExportWeapons.description: Axes worthy of an executioner, refined to Orokin perfection.
ExportWeapons.name: Dual Zoren Prime

ExportWeapons.description: An ancient executioners weapon, the honor of decapitation by the Scindo Prime was reserved for the Orokin's most respected enemies.
ExportWeapons.name: Scindo Prime

ExportWeapons.description: The Latron Wraith is a powerful variation of the standard, semi-automatic rifle that features unique styling.
ExportWeapons.name: Latron Wraith

ExportWeapons.description: Quickly fire off a volley of deadly bolts with the Attica repeating crossbow.
ExportWeapons.name: Attica

ExportWeapons.description: An energy projectile bursts forth from the Steflos and grows as it rushes toward enemies. The projectile's duration increases when it hits an enemy. When Citrine fires the Steflos, its projectile speed increases.
ExportWeapons.name: Steflos

ExportWeapons.description: This Tenno crafted, lever action rifle, is equal parts elegance and executioner.
ExportWeapons.name: Sybaris

ExportWeapons.description: Strike with silent lightning or the pummeling drum of thunder. Alternate between stealthy short-range electrical discharge, and automatic lightning gun. Faster mode-switch when used by Wisp.
ExportWeapons.name: Fulmin

ExportWeapons.description: Make easy prey of enemies with this quiet, agile, and pinpoint accurate Tenno submachine gun.
ExportWeapons.name: Baza

ExportWeapons.description: This unusual automatic rifle feels strangely familiar and has two fire modes. Primary fire packs radiation damage. Alternate fire charges up to launch an explosive projectile.
ExportWeapons.name: Aeolak

ExportWeapons.description: Precise calibration, rapid trigger-pull and a steady hand all combine to bring down the hardiest prey on two legs or four.
ExportWeapons.name: Veldt

ExportWeapons.description: The Quellor was standard-issue to Dax Railjack crews of the Old War, dating back to the earliest, pre-Sigma craft. A rapid-fire assault rifle with a hefty magazine-size, the Quellor is an all-round workhorse. Also capable of large, short-range cryo-blasts.
ExportWeapons.name: Quellor

ExportWeapons.description: Like a breath of wind, shots fired by this multi-barrel sniper are felt but never seen by its targets. Headshots in quick succession increase the Perigale’s ammo efficiency. When the Perigale is wielded by Voruna, its ammo pool increases.
ExportWeapons.name: Perigale

ExportWeapons.description: Blast targets with corrosive plasma projectiles, or toss the scepter to inflict an energy field upon nearby enemies that amplifies their brain waves to attract bullets.
ExportWeapons.name: Scourge

ExportWeapons.description: Styanax’s speargun matches his might. Throw Afentis to pin an enemy and nearby enemies will also be stunned. Throw Afentis onto the ground to buff nearby allies with Ballistarii Might. The buff increases reload speed, fire rate, and ammo pools and reduces recoil. Allies who kill enemies with Ballistarii Might maintain the buff temporarily when they move away from Afentis.
ExportWeapons.name: Afentis

ExportWeapons.description: Deliver a massive punch with each blast of this shotgun, or launch a round that explodes mid-air knocking down nearby enemies.
ExportWeapons.name: Corinth

ExportWeapons.description: Blast enemies with glass slugs that devastate on impact. In Gara's hands, this signature weapon has a larger Ammo Pool.
ExportWeapons.name: Astilla

ExportWeapons.description: Cyte-09's signature rifle is an ideal match for forceful gunners. A precisely timed reload increases reload speed and infuses the new magazine with Heat Damage.
ExportWeapons.name: Reconifex

ExportWeapons.description: Unload percussive machine gun fire, or strike a heavy chord with a single charge shot. When Octavia wields her signature rifle alt-fire Headshot Kills have a chance to instantly refill the magazine.
ExportWeapons.name: Tenora

ExportWeapons.description: Launch a glaive that ricochets off surfaces in bursts of elemental damage, then perforate enemies with primary fire’s precision buck-shot. Damage increases with each Status Effect afflicting a target. Lavos will transmute a small portion of any ammo pickup to Primary Ammo when wielding his signature Cedo.
ExportWeapons.name: Cedo

ExportWeapons.description: A high-capacity, high-damage enforcer, this weapon can switch between the high crit semi-automatic and full automatic firing modes.
ExportWeapons.name: Stradavar

ExportWeapons.description: Using a barrage of rapid-fire plasma rockets, Gauss’ signature weapon lays down a path of destruction. Reloads are faster while sprinting, even more so in Gauss’ hands. For safety, rockets arm after traveling a safe distance.
ExportWeapons.name: Acceltra

ExportWeapons.description: For the hunter, the apex of the sniper's art. For the hunted, a gateway to the next life.
ExportWeapons.name: Rubico Prime

ExportWeapons.description: Irradiate enemies with a continuous stream of deadly plasma. Charging secondary fire releases a glob of plasma that erupts with homing bomblets on impact. Increased Magazine Capacity when wielded by Revenant.
ExportWeapons.name: Phantasma

ExportWeapons.description: This devastating automatic crossbow is the perfect marriage of ancient Earth weaponry and Tenno technology.
ExportWeapons.name: Zhuge

ExportWeapons.description: Tenno artistry. Ancient craft. A weapon of surgical precision and devastating effect. Each bolt fired by Zhuge Prime explodes shortly after embedding.
ExportWeapons.name: Zhuge Prime

ExportWeapons.description: Once thought destroyed, the newly uncovered Vectis Prime revives Tenno martial traditions.
ExportWeapons.name: Vectis Prime

ExportWeapons.description: Sleek lines and golden accents define this masterpiece of the illustrious Entrati family.
ExportWeapons.name: Trumna Prime

ExportWeapons.description: An artifact of exquisite beauty. A weapon of deadly purpose.
ExportWeapons.name: Tigris Prime

ExportWeapons.description: Art meets ingenuity with this beautifully deadly rifle.
ExportWeapons.name: Tiberon Prime

ExportWeapons.description: Add lethal staccato percussion to Octavia's melodies with this masterpiece assault rifle.
ExportWeapons.name: Tenora Prime

ExportWeapons.description: Sleek and slender, a golden symbol of Tenno perfection.
ExportWeapons.name: Sybaris Prime

ExportWeapons.description: A classic shotgun design, embellished for the elite as only the Orokin could.
ExportWeapons.name: Strun Prime

ExportWeapons.description: Between measured staccato and staggering crescendo, Stradavar Prime never fails to call down a devastating finale.
ExportWeapons.name: Stradavar Prime

ExportWeapons.description: Known for taking down whole squads with its single massive magazine, few weapons were as feared as the Prime Soma.
ExportWeapons.name: Soma Prime

ExportWeapons.description: Smite the unrighteous with Harrow Prime's signature speargun.
ExportWeapons.name: Scourge Prime

ExportWeapons.description: Phantasma Prime is burnished with deadly force. In Revenant’s hands, it has increased magazine capacity. The might of its irradiated plasma is reminiscent of the fearsome Eidolon.
ExportWeapons.name: Phantasma Prime

ExportWeapons.description: The max-velocity saw-launcher perfected. Features a larger magazine, faster fire rate, and a radial, slashing ricochet.
ExportWeapons.name: Panthera Prime

ExportWeapons.description: A golden version of Garuda’s versatile crossbow, as fashioned by the Orokin’s finest weaponsmiths. Alt-fire to let loose a barrage of bolts. All bolts have a chance to cause <DT_SLASH_COLOR>Slash Status, and Headshot kills have a chance to increase Reload Speed. When wielded by Garuda the Nagantaka gains a slight Punch Through.
ExportWeapons.name: Nagantaka Prime

ExportWeapons.description: Wield a storm. Fulmin Prime's electric rounds switch between lightning beams and short-range bursts. Wisp quickly swaps between each mode with her elemental prowess.
ExportWeapons.name: Fulmin Prime

ExportWeapons.description: Heavy in the hand with a bone-crunching kickback. This Prime version of this shotgun adds remote detonation of the weapon's airburst round.
ExportWeapons.name: Corinth Prime

ExportWeapons.description: A golden shotgun, forged for those who deliver judgment.
ExportWeapons.name: Cedo Prime

ExportWeapons.description: Once thought lost to the ages, attempts to reengineer the Burston Prime never fully replicated this weapon's power and agility.
ExportWeapons.name: Burston Prime

ExportWeapons.description: Fires Orokin designed bolts that are faster and sharper.
ExportWeapons.name: Boltor Prime

ExportWeapons.description: This rapid-fire classic is the Orokin-engineered definition of silent, pinpoint lethality.
ExportWeapons.name: Baza Prime

ExportWeapons.description: Loose explosive glass slugs that tear through enemies with Gara’s signature shotgun, presented here in its spectacular Prime form.
ExportWeapons.name: Astilla Prime

ExportWeapons.description: Engage your enemies with deadly speed. This weapon reloads even faster when its wielder sprints, faster still with Gauss.
ExportWeapons.name: Acceltra Prime

ExportWeapons.description: Kullervo's signature weapon boasts melee synergy. Every shot that lands increases the wielder's Melee Combo count. When Kullervo wields Rauta, it also increases his Melee Combo duration.
ExportWeapons.name: Rauta

ExportWeapons.description: Firing high-velocity blades, this weapon can also be used as a battle-saw, shredding anything unfortunate enough to get within range.
ExportWeapons.name: Panthera

ExportWeapons.description: Deploy the radar disc to reveal hidden enemies and then strike with precision shots that punch through all obstacles in the way.
ExportWeapons.name: Zenith

ExportWeapons.description: Gyre’s signature weapon has two fire modes. Primary fire shocks enemies with electrical orbs. Alternate fire is a large ball of electricity that sticks to any surface and pulses <DT_ELECTRICITY_COLOR>Electricity before it explodes. In Gyre's hands, the weapon has a small amount of multishot.
ExportWeapons.name: Alternox

ExportWeapons.description: Depend on Higasa when it rains bullets. Aiming creates a shield that blocks weapon fire. Kills and blocked shots charge a beam released by Alternate Fire.
ExportWeapons.name: Higasa

ExportWeapons.description: Slash targets with a single precise bolt from Garuda's signature crossbow. Alt-fire to let loose a barrage of bolts. All bolts have a chance to cause <DT_SLASH_COLOR>Slash Status, and Headshots have a chance to increase Reload Speed. When wielded by Garuda Nagantaka gains a slight Punch Through.
ExportWeapons.name: Nagantaka

ExportWeapons.description: Scope out the enemy with this long-range revolver style rifle.
ExportWeapons.name: Rubico

ExportWeapons.description: Forged by a master gunsmith, this Tenno burst rifle will strike down targets with swift precision.
ExportWeapons.name: Tiberon

ExportWeapons.description: The double-barreled Tigris shotgun fires two bursts in rapid succession, easily taking down the toughest prey.
ExportWeapons.name: Tigris

ExportWeapons.description: A gift from the Lotus to commemorate the third anniversary of the first Tenno waking from Cryo stasis.
ExportWeapons.name: Dex Sybaris

ExportWeapons.description: Claim the power of Albrecht Entrati's knowledge. Customize the Grimoire with Tome Mods that enhance Warframe Abilities and reward strategic combat. Its alternate attack releases a voltaic orb with guaranteed <DT_ELECTRICITY_COLOR>Electricity Status.
ExportWeapons.name: Grimoire

ExportWeapons.description: Claim the power of Albrecht Entrati's knowledge. Customize the Grimoire with Tome Mods that enhance Warframe Abilities and reward strategic combat. Its alternate attack releases a voltaic orb with guaranteed <DT_ELECTRICITY_COLOR>Electricity Status.
ExportWeapons.name: Grimoire

ExportWeapons.description: Dread is the calling card of The Stalker. It fires arrows that can decapitate.
ExportWeapons.name: Dread

ExportWeapons.description: Discovered deep inside an ancient Orokin derelict, the Paris Prime increases the kinetic energy of any bolt it fires, dealing more damage than its more common counterpart.
ExportWeapons.name: Paris Prime

ExportWeapons.description: Based on one of the world's oldest weapon designs, this Tenno-crafted weapon can be used both in stealth and in open combat. The Paris uses a chargeable magnetic field to launch arrows capable of impaling enemies to walls.
ExportWeapons.name: Paris

ExportWeapons.description:
Counter the dread of battle with a song of praise. Enemies cannot hurt your allies while wounded by Evensong's arrows. Kills with Evensong empower ally weapons with Multishot.

Experience the true power of Jade’s Ensemble when Evensong, Cantare, and Harmony sing together.
ExportWeapons.name: Evensong

ExportWeapons.description: Each arrow spawns a swarm of sticky appendages on impact. These tongue-like probes latch onto nearby unfortunates and drag them close before bursting into a mess of diseased goo.
ExportWeapons.name: Proboscis Cernos

ExportWeapons.description: Long believed lost, the mighty Daikyu Prime was the pride of many a Tenno dojo. Designed to strike the foe where they are weakest, its powerful shots repay careful marksmanship.
ExportWeapons.name: Daikyu Prime

ExportWeapons.description: A noble bow to hunt hellish beasts.
ExportWeapons.name: Cernos Prime

ExportWeapons.description: Hunhow’s gift, carved from the bones of his kin. Shots can be charged and held; release them just before full charge for maximum effect.
ExportWeapons.name: Nataruk

ExportWeapons.description: The versatile Cinta can fire arrows in quick succession, quickly charge a shock wave, or fully charge a powerful focused shot.
ExportWeapons.name: Cinta

ExportWeapons.description: Daikyu takes great strength to draw back, but provides added power and range to every shot.
ExportWeapons.name: Daikyu

ExportWeapons.description: Evoking the design of ancient bows, the high impact Cernos is perfect for hunting down highly shielded enemies.
ExportWeapons.name: Cernos

ExportWeapons.description: From death blooms the Larkspur. A unique and menacing Archgun with a wild initial attack that locks onto a target then chains other targets close to the first. It also sports an explosive projectile mode. In Hildryn's grip the Larkspur carries more reserve ammo.
ExportWeapons.name: Larkspur

ExportWeapons.description: Mandonel fires <DT_RADIATION_COLOR>Radiation Damage projectiles. Partially charged shots release a spread and fully charged shots release a beam that dissolves into a radiation field. Projectiles that pass through the field are empowered.
ExportWeapons.name: Mandonel

ExportWeapons.description: Blast through enemies with a double-barreled shot of energized slugs. This siphons their life essence which is then used to generate the secondary fire's massive air-burst mortar. The ancient Entrati weapon was built for Necramechs but also functions as an Archgun.
ExportWeapons.name: Morgha

ExportWeapons.description: An ancient weapon designed by the Entrati for use by their Necramechs. Primary fire siphons life essence from the target to fuel a devastating secondary fire. Punishing automatic primary fire and a secondary mode that charges up to unleash a destructive beam of energy with a large explosion at point of impact.
ExportWeapons.name: Mausolon

ExportWeapons.description: An ancient weapon designed by the Entrati for use by their Necramechs. Primary fire siphons life essence from the target to fuel a devastating secondary fire. A heavy flamethrower with surprising range. Secondary fire launches three projectiles in a fan pattern that explode, leaving a damaging area of effect for a short duration.
ExportWeapons.name: Cortege

ExportWeapons.description: An Archwing energy weapon that sends waves of deadly plasma crashing into enemies.
ExportWeapons.name: Fluctus

ExportWeapons.description: Shatter your targets with explosive shells from this devastating Archwing cannon.
ExportWeapons.name: Grattler

ExportWeapons.description: When fully charged, the magnetized barrel of the Velocitus accelerates a metal slug to tremendous speeds, piercing hulls and obliterating armor.
ExportWeapons.name: Velocitus

ExportWeapons.description: Embrace pandemonium. Chainfire and explosive potential meet in Larkspur Prime. Hildryn packs more ammo when she wields this mighty weapon.
ExportWeapons.name: Larkspur Prime

ExportWeapons.description: Flaunting ceremonial beauty, this arch gun flak cannon is even more devastating than its standard issue counterpart.
ExportWeapons.name: Corvas Prime

ExportWeapons.description: When fully charged, this flak cannon delivers a devastating shot. Perfect for taking down fast-moving interceptors.
ExportWeapons.name: Corvas

ExportWeapons.description: The Imperator Vandal has been customized by the Tenno with a blue-green metallic finish and Lotus branding on the barrel.
ExportWeapons.name: Imperator Vandal

ExportWeapons.description: A long range rifle capable of firing in space, the Imperator's versatility makes it an ideal weapon for space combat.
ExportWeapons.name: Imperator

ExportWeapons.description: Delivering twin streams of highly accurate, rapid-fire ordnance, the Decurion are specifically designed for combat in the vacuum of space.
ExportWeapons.name: Dual Decurion

ExportWeapons.description: Colder than space and less forgiving, Prisma crystals bring elite efficiency to the already sleek Dual Decurion. Requiring the lightest of touches to reload, these twin archguns prove that heavy weaponry can still possess elegance.
ExportWeapons.name: Prisma Dual Decurions

ExportWeapons.description: Devastate free-space enemies with Phaedra, the Soma's big-sister.
ExportWeapons.name: Phaedra

ExportWeapons.description: Unload deadly accurate bursts of mayhem.
ExportWeapons.name: Cyngas

ExportWeapons.description: A rare object of beauty, this Archwing sword has been sheathed in prisma crystal and baptized in the Void’s energy.
ExportWeapons.name: <ARCHWING> Prisma Veritux

ExportWeapons.description: Gallium-alloy gauntlets for close-range Archwing combat. Designed by the infamous Tyl Regor.
ExportWeapons.name: <ARCHWING> Knux

ExportWeapons.description: Heavy attacks briefly transform the Corufell into a Gunblade. After the Gunblade fires, the Corufell returns to its Heavy Scythe state. Its transformation is fastest in Citrine’s hands.
ExportWeapons.name: Corufell

ExportWeapons.description: Part sword, part shield, the Centaur excels at charging headlong into enemy fire.
ExportWeapons.name: <ARCHWING> Centaur

ExportWeapons.description: Weightless space turns this impossibly massive sword into an agile instrument of destruction.
ExportWeapons.name: <ARCHWING> Veritux

ExportWeapons.description: This laser bladed battle-axe easily hacks through a ship's defenses and the forces protecting it.
ExportWeapons.name: <ARCHWING> Onorix

ExportWeapons.description: Tear apart incoming enemies with this massive hooked blade.
ExportWeapons.name: <ARCHWING> Agkuza

ExportWeapons.description: Become an angel of death, with this Archwing scythe.
ExportWeapons.name: <ARCHWING> Kaszas

ExportWeapons.description: Using Archwing’s jets for thrust, this massive hammer crushes anything in its path.
ExportWeapons.name: <ARCHWING> Rathbone

ExportWeapons.description: Used together, these Orokin pistols feed off each other, inflicting greater damage with an enhanced status chance for inducing elemental effects on targets.
ExportWeapons.name: Akbronco Prime

ExportWeapons.description: Vasto revolvers equipped in each hand.
ExportWeapons.name: Akvasto

ExportWeapons.description: Fill your fists with golden cannons of fury. This refined design unlocks quicker handling and higher critical chance.
ExportWeapons.name: Akmagnus Prime

ExportWeapons.description: Twice the ammo and twice the stopping power of a single Magnus.
ExportWeapons.name: Akmagnus

ExportWeapons.description: A Viper equipped in each hand.
ExportWeapons.name: Twin Vipers

ExportWeapons.description: A Bronco equipped in each hand.
ExportWeapons.name: Akbronco

ExportWeapons.description: A Lato equipped in each hand. Twice the Magazine Capacity and Fire Rate, but Reload time is doubled and Accuracy is lowered.
ExportWeapons.name: Aklato

ExportWeapons.description: A Bolto equipped in each hand. Twice the Magazine Capacity and slightly faster Fire Rate, but reload time is doubled and accuracy is lowered.
ExportWeapons.name: Akbolto

ExportWeapons.description: Furis pistols equipped in each hand. Twice the Magazine Capacity and slightly faster Fire Rate, but Accuracy and Reload Speed are lowered.
ExportWeapons.name: Afuris

ExportWeapons.description: Savage the enemy with a Lex Prime in each hand.
ExportWeapons.name: Aklex Prime

ExportWeapons.description: Dual Lex pistols double the amount of high caliber lead you can throw at the enemy, but accuracy and reload time suffer.
ExportWeapons.name: Aklex

ExportWeapons.description: Taken from defeated Grineer commanders and rebuilt to improve combat efficiency and reliability.
ExportWeapons.name: Vaykor Marelok

ExportWeapons.description: Justice blinds. Block hits to charge a Radial Blind, when fully charged Block+Heavy Attack to unleash it.
ExportWeapons.name: Vaykor Sydon

ExportWeapons.description: Forged in the fires of rebel struggle, this shotgun is a force for liberation.
ExportWeapons.name: Vaykor Hek

ExportWeapons.description: This modified ballistica is the weapon of choice used by Red Veil Assassins to take out high-priority marks.
ExportWeapons.name: Rakta Ballistica

ExportWeapons.description: Infiltrate undetected; reduced visibility when held. Then strike with confidence; hits to irradiated targets restores shields and creates overshields.
ExportWeapons.name: Rakta Dark Dagger

ExportWeapons.description: A finely tuned instrument of assassination.
ExportWeapons.name: Rakta Cernos

ExportWeapons.description: The favored side-arms of Perrin Sequence executives, these pistols have been modified to improve efficiency and killing potential.
ExportWeapons.name: Secura Dual Cestra

ExportWeapons.description: Whip the enemy out of their ill-gotten gains; double credit drops on kills.
ExportWeapons.name: Secura Lecta

ExportWeapons.description: Ruthless and efficient, just like the free-market.
ExportWeapons.name: Secura Penta

ExportWeapons.description: This remotely detonated electrical trap is used by devotees of New Loka to protect their temples and shrines.
ExportWeapons.name: Sancti Castanas

ExportWeapons.description: Each charged attack turns the enemy’s pain into a healing pulse that washes over allies. Also, creates resistance to Status Effects when held.
ExportWeapons.name: Sancti Magistar

ExportWeapons.description: Echo nature's violent beauty with this special Tigris.
ExportWeapons.name: Sancti Tigris

ExportWeapons.description: Deployed by the Cephalon Suda, once a data-analyzing instrument the Gammacor main focus is defense.
ExportWeapons.name: Synoid Gammacor

ExportWeapons.description: Designed to quickly vaporize minerals for content analysis, users discovered its powerful beam was equally efficient at dispatching hostiles.
ExportWeapons.name: Gammacor

ExportWeapons.description: This intelligent hammer takes an enemy killed by a Heavy Attack and recomposes them as an ally. Any fatal strike with this weapon also performs a Codex scan.
ExportWeapons.name: Synoid Heliocor

ExportWeapons.description: Cephalon Suda’s custom issue Simulor was built to satisfy her curiosity.
ExportWeapons.name: Synoid Simulor

ExportWeapons.description: For the Arbiters of Hexis these pistols are more than simple weapons, they are symbols of truth and discipline.
ExportWeapons.name: Telos Akbolto

ExportWeapons.description: Spinning attacks unleash the Stormpath, a tempest of mayhem that hurls any foes in its way.
ExportWeapons.name: Telos Boltace

ExportWeapons.description: Bring down judgement, with this boltor crafted by the Arbiters of Hexis.
ExportWeapons.name: Telos Boltor

ExportWeapons.description: This arm-cannon, ripped from a Sentient, rapid-fires thermal pulses that explode in an electrical blast. Features an ammo-less quick charge capacitor, that emits a knock-back pulse and strips Sentient damage resistances when fully discharged.
ExportWeapons.name: Shedu

ExportWeapons.description: This Sentient war instrument can either barrage targets with explosive bolts, or, draw on its regenerative battery to create twin plasma beams that chain through targets. When fully drained, Health is leached from nearby foes for a short period.
ExportWeapons.name: Basmu

ExportWeapons.description: Caliban’s signature scythe, forged from a limb wrenched off a fallen Eidolon centuries ago. 50% increased Melee Combo Counter Chance when wielded by Caliban.
ExportWeapons.name: Venato

ExportWeapons.description: The Sentient slayer. An offering from Ballas.
ExportWeapons.name: Paracesis

ExportWeapons.description: A silent, pistol-style Amp for the Drifter. Generates its own ammunition from Void energy. A precisely timed reload over-charges the next shot.
ExportWeapons.name: Sirocco

ExportWeapons.description: An electrified jolter for quick melee takedowns, assembled from scavenged scrap. Ideal for use on unsuspecting opponents.
ExportWeapons.name: Rumblejack

ExportWeapons.description: The Strun is a standard shotgun. Reliable, versatile and deadly.
ExportWeapons.name: MK1-Strun

ExportWeapons.description: The MK1-Paris is the standard issue bow for all Tenno.
ExportWeapons.name: MK1-Paris

ExportWeapons.description: The MK1-Kunai is the standard issue throwing knives for all Tenno.
ExportWeapons.name: MK1-Kunai

ExportWeapons.description: The MK1-Furis are the standard issue automatic pistol for all Tenno.
ExportWeapons.name: MK1-Furis

ExportWeapons.description: The MK1-Furax is the standard issue fist weapon for all Tenno.
ExportWeapons.name: MK1-Furax

ExportWeapons.description: The MK1-Bo is the standard issue staff weapon for all Tenno.
ExportWeapons.name: MK1-Bo

ExportWeapons.description: A true masterpiece of Höllvanian engineering, Vesper 77's advanced laser sight highlights enemy Weak Points with precision. Aim to increase its Critical Damage Multiplier.
ExportWeapons.name: Vesper 77

ExportWeapons.description: Put them down so that they stay down, with this Scaldra slug launcher.
ExportWeapons.name: Purgator 1

ExportWeapons.description: Reap what the Techrot have sown with this vicious pair of Scaldra hand-scythes.
ExportWeapons.name: Dual Viciss

ExportWeapons.description: The standard issue personal Efervon projector, as sported by all ranks of Scaldra.
ExportWeapons.name: EFV-8 Mars

ExportWeapons.description: Perforate Techrot, and anyone else who stands in your way, with this Scaldra machine gun. Alternative fire pummels targets with Efervon laced buckshot.
ExportWeapons.name: EFV-5 Jupiter

ExportWeapons.description: This pre-Orokin weapon earned its popularity for its reliability in tough conditions. When hip-firing, its Ammo Efficiency increases. When aiming, headshots have a high Critical Chance.
ExportWeapons.name: AX-52

ExportWeapons.description: A living weapon, the infested Embolist pistol kills its victims with an acidic venomous gas.
ExportWeapons.name: Embolist

ExportWeapons.description: The Tysis pistol spits out caustic darts that corrode their victims from within.
ExportWeapons.name: Tysis

ExportWeapons.description: Brain-strikes excite this bioweapon, causing it to rapidly release toxic munitions.
ExportWeapons.name: Dual Toxocyst

ExportWeapons.description: Infect your foes with this spore-scattering pistol. Headshots burrow in and explode, releasing spore clouds that seek out nearby enemies.
ExportWeapons.name: Zymos

ExportWeapons.description: These festering sacs of pus and gas burst violently on impact.
ExportWeapons.name: Pox

ExportWeapons.description: Splatter enemies with a short-range stream of corrosive bile and then toss the ammo bladder as a grenade when reloading. The emptier the pistol’s ammo bladder, the more potent its damage. A fully empty bladder packs the biggest punch.
ExportWeapons.name: Catabolyst

ExportWeapons.description: The Scoliac Whip is a nasty parasitic growth of sinew and bone that can inflict heart stopping <DT_POISON_COLOR>Toxin Damage with attacks.
ExportWeapons.name: Scoliac

ExportWeapons.description: An instrument of unrelenting harm. If Lesion tastes blood, it becomes invigorated with faster Attack Speed and increased <DT_POISON_COLOR>Toxin Damage.
ExportWeapons.name: Lesion

ExportWeapons.description: A relic from the Great Plague, the Mire Infested Sword is a brutal weapon. It not only cuts into the enemy, it infects the wounds of its victim with a toxic nerve poison. Deals <DT_POISON_COLOR>Toxin Damage on Ground Slam attacks.
ExportWeapons.name: Mire

ExportWeapons.description: This bone-forged sword includes a tendon-whip to distract and maim the enemy.
ExportWeapons.name: Mios

ExportWeapons.description: A two-pronged attack; the bone-grafted cocoon at the tip of this polearm rends flesh, while the viral mass living within spreads itself into the wounds of each new victim.
ExportWeapons.name: Pupacyst

ExportWeapons.description: Pummel and infect with these two pulsating hunks of flesh connected by a ligament. Take-hold of the malignant evolution of an ancient martial weapon.
ExportWeapons.name: Pulmonars

ExportWeapons.description: Slash through enemies with two leaves of the exceedingly rare Arum Spinosa plant. Heavy Attack to whip a flurry of toxic spines at ranged attackers.
ExportWeapons.name: Arum Spinosa

ExportWeapons.description: Rip into the enemy with fists of razor sharp cartilage. Steals health with each critical hit.
ExportWeapons.name: Hirudo

ExportWeapons.description: Leave your mark with these infected claws with increased heavy attack range. Heavy attack at max combo to keep the extended range and slam radius for 3 minutes.
ExportWeapons.name: Keratinos

ExportWeapons.description: Heavy attacks from this scythe unleash a wave of acid that mutilates enemies and leaves a trail of corrosive sludge.
ExportWeapons.name: Caustacyst

ExportWeapons.description: Each strike of this infested glaive infects its target with viral pathogens. Occasionally, it discharges the spores of rabid, enemy-seeking maggots, either in-flight or on contact with the enemy.
ExportWeapons.name: Pathocyst

ExportWeapons.description: Twisted and tortured from exposure to the Infestation, this glaive becomes an absolute predator in the hands of the right Tenno.
ExportWeapons.name: Cerata

ExportWeapons.description: Powered by a bio-chemical reaction, the Infested Synapse rifle fries its targets with a steady stream of <DT_CORROSIVE_COLOR>Corrosive energy.
ExportWeapons.name: Synapse

ExportWeapons.description: Fires seven beams of continuous biochemical energy which depletes the life of any surface they contact.
ExportWeapons.name: Phage

ExportWeapons.description: Completely overwhelmed by Infested biology, this former Quanta now fires organic ordnance and a harpoon like appendage.
ExportWeapons.name: Paracyst

ExportWeapons.description: A bloodsucker. This symbiotic burst-rifle leeches health to forge its ammo and then restores health with each headshot.
ExportWeapons.name: Hema

ExportWeapons.description: This long-distance rifle fires a razor-sharp, virus-soaked barb that continues to attack its host before violently erupting in a spore-laden mist. Scoped headshots increase lethality.
ExportWeapons.name: Sporothrix

ExportWeapons.description: A bizarre union of Corpus technology and Infested biology, this automatic rifle can also deploy an irradiated airborne infested mass. Further field testing is required to fully understand the potential of this weapon.
ExportWeapons.name: Mutalist Quanta

ExportWeapons.description: Rain down a triple volley of explosive disease bladders from a distance, then move in for the kill by unloading a multi-shot barrage of toxic barbs with primary fire.
ExportWeapons.name: Bubonico

ExportWeapons.description: The Technocyte virus has contorted this Tysis into a more lethal weapon. With increased Damage, Critical Chance, Critical Damage and Magazine Capacity.
ExportWeapons.name: Coda Tysis

ExportWeapons.description: These festering, writhing, throwable projectiles of pus and gas have been improved with a greater Magazine Size, Critical Chance, Critical Damage, Status Chance, and Damage.
ExportWeapons.name: Coda Pox

ExportWeapons.description: When the magazine reaches empty and is manually reloaded, the Coda Catabolyst launches not one but three powerful grenades. Also has a higher Status Chance, Damage, and Magazine Size.
ExportWeapons.name: Coda Catabolyst

ExportWeapons.description: Get the job done right with a pair of spore flinging terror tools. Inflicts a spore that spreads to nearby enemies on death causing <DT_FREEZE_COLOR>Cold Status Effect and increased vulnerability to damage from the Torxica.
ExportWeapons.name: Dual Coda Torxica

ExportWeapons.description: The Plague Year of 1999 will never be the same. With improved Critical Multipler, Critical Chance, and Status Chance, the Technocyte virus has turned the Coda Mire into a truly horrifying blade.
ExportWeapons.name: Coda Mire

ExportWeapons.description: Rip and shred your enemies to pieces with the Coda Hirudo. With improved Damage, Status Chance, Critical Chance, and Critical Damage.
ExportWeapons.name: Coda Hirudo

ExportWeapons.description: Drive home the pain with this hammer evolved from a scooter assembly. The wheel shapeshifts and gains a unique buff to match whatever type of physical damage it has been modded for.
ExportWeapons.name: Coda Motovore

ExportWeapons.description: Enhanced by Technocyte mutations, the Coda Pathocyst comes with increased Damage, Critical Chance, Critical Damage and Status Chance. While in-flight or on contact with the enemy, it will occasionally spawn enhanced, enemy-seeking miasmites.
ExportWeapons.name: Coda Pathocyst

ExportWeapons.description: The Coda Caustacyst scythe is a force to be reckoned with, the Technocyte virus honing it with improved Damage, Status Chance, and Critical Damage, as well as acid pools with longer duration.
ExportWeapons.name: Coda Caustacyst

ExportWeapons.description: Firing a nonstop stream of vile corrosive gastric juice, the Coda Synapse comes with increased Magazine size, Beam Length, Status Chance, Punch Through, and Damage.
ExportWeapons.name: Coda Synapse

ExportWeapons.description: Delivers a virus-laden barb to its victim that continues to damage it before exploding. With increased Damage, Reload Speed, Magazine Size, Status Chance, and explosion radius.
ExportWeapons.name: Coda Sporothrix

ExportWeapons.description: The Technocyte virus did nothing but increase the Hema’s thirst for blood. With increased Fire Rate, Magazine Size, Critical Chance, Critical Damage, Status Chance, and Damage.
ExportWeapons.name: Coda Hema

ExportWeapons.description: Amplify shockwaves of devastating sound with this Technocyte virus infested shotgun that hungers for blood, and desires nothing more than to feed upon its enemies. Alternative fire at enemies not vulnerable to Mercy Kills to swarm them with infested mites, while firing at vulnerable ones will perform a ranged execution.
ExportWeapons.name: Coda Bassocyst

ExportWeapons.description: Overcome with Infestation, this bow's arrows now spread poisonous contagion to any surface they hit.
ExportWeapons.name: Mutalist Cernos

ExportWeapons.description: What the Aegrit lacks in quantity it makes up for in destructive power. Toss the Aegrit onto your enemy’s position then detonate remotely at the right moment for maximum destructive effect.
ExportWeapons.name: Aegrit

ExportWeapons.description: The uniquely styled Twin Vipers Wraith are a powerful variation on the standard akimbo machine-pistols.
ExportWeapons.name: Twin Vipers Wraith

ExportWeapons.description: The uniquely styled Viper Wraith is a powerful variation on the standard machine-pistol.
ExportWeapons.name: Viper Wraith

ExportWeapons.description: This particle cannon generates a condensed beam of super-heated plasma designed to melt rock to ore, and enemies to molten slag.
ExportWeapons.name: Atomos

ExportWeapons.description: Inflict rapid-fire bursts of pain with this Grineer submachine gun.
ExportWeapons.name: Stubba

ExportWeapons.description: Rain hell on the enemy with this handheld cluster-rocket launcher.
ExportWeapons.name: Kulstar

ExportWeapons.description: These twin barrels of destruction are the signature pistols of the Kuva Guardians.
ExportWeapons.name: Twin Rogga

ExportWeapons.description: Like the larger Kohm, this hand-shotgun doubles its volley with each successive shot.
ExportWeapons.name: Kohmak

ExportWeapons.description: Doubling their volley on each successive shot, the Twin Kohmaks decimate foes in seconds.
ExportWeapons.name: Twin Kohmak

ExportWeapons.description: A compact four-barreled design packing a self-charging capacitor that discharges upon every reload from empty. Features auto hip-fire and aimed fire is semi-auto, four-shot instant burst.
ExportWeapons.name: Quatz

ExportWeapons.description: Creates and focuses a high-frequency field of microwaves, literally cooking the target from within.
ExportWeapons.name: Nukor

ExportWeapons.description: The Marelok combines the stopping power of a rifle with the portability of a pistol.
ExportWeapons.name: Marelok

ExportWeapons.description: Simple but powerful. The semi-automatic Brakk hand cannon delivers a lot of punch in a small package.
ExportWeapons.name: Brakk

ExportWeapons.description: Firing a sticky, toxic, explosive compound, the Stug Gel Gun offers multiple ejection modes, delivering maximum damage in all situations.
ExportWeapons.name: Stug

ExportWeapons.description: Fused with prisma crystals, these pristine Grineer sidearms are sure to intimidate any foe.
ExportWeapons.name: Prisma Twin Gremlins

ExportWeapons.description: Rend enemies and up the heat with these mining tools repurposed into machine-tonfa. Building the Combo Multiplier overheats the Tonkkatts, setting enemies ablaze.
ExportWeapons.name: Tonkkatt

ExportWeapons.description: Slash and blast with this heavy Gunblade of brutal Grineer design. High slash damage paired with a heavy shotgun attack.
ExportWeapons.name: Vastilok

ExportWeapons.description: Inflict maximum devastation with this massive Grineer trident.
ExportWeapons.name: Sydon

ExportWeapons.description: When they go high, go low. Powerful pneumatic grips and toecaps amplify every blow. Four ways to deal twice the pain.
ExportWeapons.name: Korrudo

ExportWeapons.description: The Slaytra is a powerful reiteration of the traditional Grineer Machete that doubles the duration of <DT_SLASH_COLOR>Slash Status Effects.
ExportWeapons.name: Slaytra
