ExportWeapons.description: A shattered talisman of the Grineer Elder Queen. It pulls health orbs from deceased enemies and energy orbs from destroyed robots.
ExportWeapons.name: Broken Scepter

ExportWeapons.description: A crushing, killing, rocket-powered stab-hammer. Grineer, naturally.
ExportWeapons.name: Kuva Shildeg

ExportWeapons.description: Overwhelm hostiles with this jet-powered sickle and razor-chain weapon. Charged strikes ignite an explosive blast at range.
ExportWeapons.name: Jat Kusar

ExportWeapons.description: The cruelest of weapons built for the crudest of Grineer soldiers. Rips through metal like flesh, and through flesh like day-old pudding.
ExportWeapons.name: Ghoulsaw

ExportWeapons.description: This hooked blade rewards critical hits to those skilled enough to strike with finesse.
ExportWeapons.name: Krohkur

ExportWeapons.description: Battlefield butchery becomes all too easy with a Krohkur blade in each hand.
ExportWeapons.name: Twin Krohkur

ExportWeapons.description: These nasty, little hatchets slice through steel as if it were flesh.
ExportWeapons.name: Twin Basolk

ExportWeapons.description: A different take on the throwing mace, the Halikar Wraith features unique styling.
ExportWeapons.name: Halikar Wraith

ExportWeapons.description: This jet powered Grineer throwing mace always comes back to its master and is even capable of disarming targets.
ExportWeapons.name: Halikar

ExportWeapons.description: A multi-bladed whip that is adept at flaying skin from bone. In extreme cases, disobedient Grineer are sentenced to death by Atterax.
ExportWeapons.name: Atterax

ExportWeapons.description: Tyl Regor’s custom axe and shield are how he likes to eliminate ‘frustrations’.
ExportWeapons.name: Ack & Brunt

ExportWeapons.description: A different take on a familiar combat knife, the Machete Wraith features unique styling.
ExportWeapons.name: Machete Wraith

ExportWeapons.description: The addition of Prisma Crystal allows this otherwise barbaric weapon to elegantly hack through any foe.
ExportWeapons.name: Prisma Machete

ExportWeapons.description: Blades of energized prisma crystal make these ornamental cleavers cut as sharply as they look.
ExportWeapons.name: Prisma Dual Cleavers

ExportWeapons.description: A ferocious Melee Weapon crafted by the Grineer and carried by their elite melee forces.
ExportWeapons.name: Machete

ExportWeapons.description: Butcher your foes with brutal blades in each hand.
ExportWeapons.name: Dual Cleavers

ExportWeapons.description: Deliver crushing blows with this Grineer built, jet powered mace.
ExportWeapons.name: Jat Kittag

ExportWeapons.description: Slice through mobs of unruly enemies with this fierce halberd; the signature weapon of the Kuva Guardians.
ExportWeapons.name: Kesheg

ExportWeapons.description: Built for close combat, the Sheev's plasma blade slices through flesh and armor with equal ease.
ExportWeapons.name: Sheev

ExportWeapons.description: Motorized saw claw weapon.
ExportWeapons.name: Ripkas

ExportWeapons.description: The Gorgon Wraith is a powerful variant of its precursor that features unique styling.
ExportWeapons.name: Gorgon Wraith

ExportWeapons.description: Adorned with void hardened prisma crystal, this Gorgon variant is prized for its beauty and enhanced mechanics.
ExportWeapons.name: Prisma Gorgon

ExportWeapons.description: Pick off targets by highlighting distant enemies using this Grineer rifle's advanced laser sighting system. Deadly in both single fire and automatic modes.
ExportWeapons.name: Argonak

ExportWeapons.description: For every shot fired in rapid succession the Kohm releases an additional bolt and grows more lethal.
ExportWeapons.name: Kohm

ExportWeapons.description: Long before clone-rot set in, elite Grineer Commanders protected the surviving Orokin from rebelling Warframes with these formidable rifles. When Gotva Prime inflicts a Status Effect, its next shot has a chance to be a Super Critical hit.
ExportWeapons.name: Gotva Prime

ExportWeapons.description: Detonate heads with this slow-firing rifle that rewards precision.
ExportWeapons.name: Kuva Chakkhurr

ExportWeapons.description: Spike enemies to the wall or reel them in with this burst harpoon gun.
ExportWeapons.name: Harpak

ExportWeapons.description: Hurl mayhem and destruction with this Grineer grenade launcher.
ExportWeapons.name: Tonkor

ExportWeapons.description: Mark your targets and unleash a barrage of bullets, the Buzlok's homing rounds always find the enemy. Marked targets are more likely to take critical hits.
ExportWeapons.name: Buzlok

ExportWeapons.description: Annihilate targets with four simultaneous shots from this high-caliber Grineer rifle.
ExportWeapons.name: Quartakk

ExportWeapons.description: Launch super-heated slugs at individual foes, or hurl the entire weapon and ignite groups of enemies in a flash inferno.
ExportWeapons.name: Javlok

ExportWeapons.description: Unload a barrage of explosives or a huge shot of flak from this cannon’s enormous barrel.
ExportWeapons.name: Zarr

ExportWeapons.description: A blood-red variant of this devastating sniper rifle.
ExportWeapons.name: Vulkar Wraith

ExportWeapons.description: Built by the Grineer for their elite troopers, the Vulkar is a devastating distance weapon. In the right hands it is capable of taking down targets long before they get into attack range.
ExportWeapons.name: Vulkar

ExportWeapons.description: The Miter launches high velocity saw blades, tearing apart anyone unfortunate enough to be in their path.
ExportWeapons.name: Miter

ExportWeapons.description: A different take on the Grineer assault rifle, the Karak Wraith features unique styling.
ExportWeapons.name: Karak Wraith

ExportWeapons.description: Solid, dependable and deadly. The Karak is a standard issue rifle in many Grineer platoons.
ExportWeapons.name: Karak

ExportWeapons.description: Prisma-crystal enhancement creates here a prestige instrument; a weapon capable of taking life at astonishing range with but a single pull of its exquisitely-tooled trigger.
ExportWeapons.name: Prisma Grinlok

ExportWeapons.description: With pinpoint accuracy, the Grinlok lever-action repeating rifle can easily find the soft spot on any target.
ExportWeapons.name: Grinlok

ExportWeapons.description: The Drakgoon flak cannon sends volleys of intensely hot shrapnel ricocheting around the room. Can be fired in wide or concentrated bursts.
ExportWeapons.name: Drakgoon

ExportWeapons.description: When one Grakata isn't enough, bring another for extra firepower.
ExportWeapons.name: Twin Grakatas

ExportWeapons.description: Equipped with a huge Magazine and impressive Fire Rate, the Grakata is the preferred weapon of Grineer Lancers.
ExportWeapons.name: Grakata

ExportWeapons.description: A powerful mid-range rifle used by Grineer shock troops, the Hind fires in five round bursts.
ExportWeapons.name: Hind

ExportWeapons.description: Double-fist rapid-fire bursts of pain with these dual-wield variants of the Grineer submachine gun. Higher Fire Rate and Magazine Capacity.
ExportWeapons.name: Kuva Twin Stubbas

ExportWeapons.description: This variant pistol has higher fire rate and magazine capacity. Superior zoom capabilities plus projectiles have a small Corrosive burst.
ExportWeapons.name: Kuva Seer

ExportWeapons.description: A highly-optimized Nukor that allows for the weapon’s microwave field to hit up to two additional targets.
ExportWeapons.name: Kuva Nukor

ExportWeapons.description: A custom variant that fires three quick shots with a single pull of the trigger, or can alt-fire burst the remainder of its magazine. Higher Fire Rate, Magazine Capacity and Reload Speed.
ExportWeapons.name: Kuva Kraken

ExportWeapons.description: This Lich-variant semi-automatic hand cannon delivers a lot of punch in a small package. Higher fire rate, magazine capacity and reload speed.
ExportWeapons.name: Kuva Brakk

ExportWeapons.description: An even stronger Zarr cannon to meet the demands of Kuva Liches. With stronger explosive barrages, and long-range flak shots.
ExportWeapons.name: Kuva Zarr

ExportWeapons.description: This Lich-variant grenade launcher hurls mayhem and destruction with an increased Reload Speed.
ExportWeapons.name: Kuva Tonkor

ExportWeapons.description: The Kuva Sobek’s exceptional Reload Speed, Critical Chance, and Status Chance make it a natural fit for the Kuva Lich’s dominant spirit.
ExportWeapons.name: Kuva Sobek

ExportWeapons.description: Unlike a standard Quartakk this Kuva Lich variant fires automatically from the hip while retaining its signature feature when aimed: annihilating targets with four simultaneous shots.
ExportWeapons.name: Kuva Quartakk

ExportWeapons.description: The custom weapon of a fearsome Kuva Lich. Unlike the basic version the Kuva Ogris fires detonite-infused casings semi-automatically, from a smaller magazine, while dealing greater damage per shot.
ExportWeapons.name: Kuva Ogris

ExportWeapons.description: The Kuva Kohm variant has a higher fire rate than the original. For every shot fired in rapid succession the Kuva Kohm releases an additional bolt and grows more lethal.
ExportWeapons.name: Kuva Kohm

ExportWeapons.description: The custom weapon of a fearsome Kuva Lich. It has greater reload speed, lower recoil and greater accuracy than the standard-issue Karak rifle.
ExportWeapons.name: Kuva Karak

ExportWeapons.description: This powerful Grineer burst rifle has been retrofitted to add semi-automatic and automatic fire modes.
ExportWeapons.name: Kuva Hind

ExportWeapons.description: Forged at the behest of the Worm Queen herself, this already powerful shotgun now has the additional ability to fire from all four barrels simultaneously.
ExportWeapons.name: Kuva Hek

ExportWeapons.description: The Kuva Drakgoon flak cannon sends volleys of intensely hot shrapnel ricocheting around the room that do not slow down. Larger Magazine Capacity and Reload Speed. Can be fired in wide or concentrated bursts.
ExportWeapons.name: Kuva Drakgoon

ExportWeapons.description: Reconfigured for maximum lethality, the Kuva Grattler still shatters targets with explosive shells, but now reaches maximum fire-rate instantaneously.
ExportWeapons.name: Kuva Grattler

ExportWeapons.description: Sweep aside hordes of enemies with flaming fury of this powerful, automatic, grenade launching archgun.
ExportWeapons.name: Kuva Ayanga

ExportWeapons.description: Captain Vor's prized Orokin-Grineer hybrid pistol has an average rate of fire, but it has high damage and superior zoom capabilities.
ExportWeapons.name: Seer

ExportWeapons.description: The Kraken is a heavy pistol of Grineer design that fires two quick shots with a single pull of the trigger. Skilled marksmen will appreciate the value in this deadly accurate weapon.
ExportWeapons.name: Kraken

ExportWeapons.description: A full-auto pistol known as the most compact and lightweight weapon of the Grineer arsenal. Though it has a small Magazine Capacity, the Viper has a very high Fire Rate and ultra-fast reload times thanks to a simplified magazine design.
ExportWeapons.name: Viper

ExportWeapons.description: Designed as a pair, these Grineer sidearms fire projectiles at a slower rate but with greater force and accuracy.
ExportWeapons.name: Twin Gremlins

ExportWeapons.description: This Grineer bow delivers vengeance in the form of clusterbomb-tipped arrows that can be detonated mid-air or on impact. Low quiver capacity, arrows are recovered singly.
ExportWeapons.name: Kuva Bramma

ExportWeapons.description: This scoped pistol analyzes strikes, learning how to damage its targets most effectively. Achieve maximum damage output after five successive hits.
ExportWeapons.name: Arca Scisco

ExportWeapons.description: Cultivate a meaningful relationship with this deceptively simple battery-powered pistol. The Plinx rewards attention and investment from the wise.
ExportWeapons.name: Plinx

ExportWeapons.description: A weapon that reaches for its next victim even as it kills. With each takedown, this pistol spawns an energy tendril that reaches for a nearby target.
ExportWeapons.name: Ocucor

ExportWeapons.description: Sentient tech merges with Corpus design to deliver this lethal sidearm. Fully automatic, it fires ricocheting, homing projectiles that release small clouds of <DT_GAS_COLOR>Gas on impact. Alt-fire to release the entire magazine without homing as a single burst.
ExportWeapons.name: Cyanex

ExportWeapons.description: Dominate rivals with this pistol’s lightning fast rail-slugs. Head-shots speed up reload.
ExportWeapons.name: Tenet Spirex

ExportWeapons.description: Imbued with the finest Prisma crystal, this refined Angstrum features boosted charge and reload speeds.
ExportWeapons.name: Prisma Angstrum

ExportWeapons.description: Capable of firing multiple rockets at once, the Angstrum is a handheld instrument of destruction.
ExportWeapons.name: Angstrum

ExportWeapons.description: Send a massive charge of potential energy hurling toward unfortunate targets.
ExportWeapons.name: Staticor

ExportWeapons.description: Forgo ammunition with the regenerating energy disc in this plasma throwing pistol.
ExportWeapons.name: Cycron

ExportWeapons.description: Itemize and execute with this pair of auto-lock-on, homing-projectile pistols. Shoot from-hip for a more conventional pistol experience. The patented Granum Attaché System reloads the pistols when holstered.
ExportWeapons.name: Tenet Diplos

ExportWeapons.description: Blasts targets with a massive wave of sonic energy. Results reported to be: 'Very Satisfying'.
ExportWeapons.name: Sonicor

ExportWeapons.description: A special-order Corpus cutting tool for master crafters only. Features distinctive azurite plating and a focusing crystal of precision clarity and cut.
ExportWeapons.name: Spectra Vandal

ExportWeapons.description: Wield two Cestras to unleash a dual torrent of high energy bolts.
ExportWeapons.name: Dual Cestra

ExportWeapons.description: Compact and deadly, the Cestra discharges bolts of energy at an increasingly rapid rate.
ExportWeapons.name: Cestra

ExportWeapons.description: The sleek lines of the Detron conceal its ferocious nature. The hand cannon's semi-automatic action takes down enemies with speed and efficiency.
ExportWeapons.name: Detron

ExportWeapons.description: Shock and maim with this heavyweight retractable whip.
ExportWeapons.name: Galvacord

ExportWeapons.description: Half taser, half whip. The Corpus Lecta delivers a deadly shock to anything it touches.
ExportWeapons.name: Lecta

ExportWeapons.description: Drive the agenda with this massive impact hammer. Heavy attacks launch devastating energy disks.
ExportWeapons.name: Tenet Agendus

ExportWeapons.description: Developed as an energy saw to scrap obsolete ships, this tool was quickly banned when rebels in the Sedna region discovered it also made an excellent weapon.
ExportWeapons.name: Serro

ExportWeapons.description: Dazzle, distract and destroy with these sparring weapons of impossibly hard prisma crystal.
ExportWeapons.name: Prisma Obex

ExportWeapons.description: The Obex system multiplies the kinetic energy of a Tenno's kicks and punches, delivering devastating blows to any target.
ExportWeapons.name: Obex

ExportWeapons.description: Each successive kill from this massive electron hammer builds an electron charge that is unleashed on slam attacks.
ExportWeapons.name: Arca Titron

ExportWeapons.description: A short-blade melee weapon with an ace up its sleeve. Send nearby enemies flying with a powerful short-range shockwave.
ExportWeapons.name: Stropha

ExportWeapons.description: Carve through enemies with surgical precision using this Corpus-tech glaive.
ExportWeapons.name: Falcor

ExportWeapons.description: An obscure glaive weapon of Corpus provenance, intrinsically linked to Specter technology. The Xoris strikes rapidly and with great devastation. It is capable of chaining combos infinitely.
ExportWeapons.name: Xoris

ExportWeapons.description: This unsophisticated Corpus survival tool does what it was designed for: hacking and splitting whatever it strikes.
ExportWeapons.name: Kreska

ExportWeapons.description: Bring the enemy to its knees with these twin electrified tonfas.
ExportWeapons.name: Ohma

ExportWeapons.description: Prisma crystals glisten in these electrified tonfas.
ExportWeapons.name: Prisma Ohma

ExportWeapons.description: On Heavy Slide Attack, this Corpus scythe launches a spinning energy disk that ricochets throughout the battlefield. Its lifetime is derived from the size of the Combo Counter. Note: The Granum Attaché system pauses the combo timer when holstered.
ExportWeapons.name: Tenet Grigori

ExportWeapons.description: The sleek lines of the Granum Attaché case conceal an infinitely sharp two-handed blade. Blocked attacks have a chance to increase the blocking angle. Note: The Granum Attaché system pauses the combo timer when holstered.
ExportWeapons.name: Tenet Livia

ExportWeapons.description: Discharge a rail of ionized death or throw the Ferrox like a spear and create a localized field of attraction no enemy can escape from.
ExportWeapons.name: Ferrox

ExportWeapons.description: A customized version of the powerful Supra, featuring a metallic finish and Lotus decal.
ExportWeapons.name: Supra Vandal

ExportWeapons.description: The Penta Launcher fires up to five grenades that can be remotely triggered at just the right moment.
ExportWeapons.name: Penta

ExportWeapons.description: Enveloped in deep red composite enamel, this Penta variant features a higher fire-rate and over-sized magazine.
ExportWeapons.name: Carmine Penta

ExportWeapons.description: When its twin-lasers converge on a target a circuit is created, frying the subject.
ExportWeapons.name: Convectrix

ExportWeapons.description: Stagger targets with blasts from this Corpus engineered plasma shotgun. Surviving enemies are consumed with radiation.
ExportWeapons.name: Arca Plasmor

ExportWeapons.description: A customized version of the Quanta, with metallic finish and Lotus decal.
ExportWeapons.name: Quanta Vandal

ExportWeapons.description: This weapon was designed to assist with the excavation of mineral deposits from large asteroids, but has been adapted for military purposes.
ExportWeapons.name: Quanta

ExportWeapons.description: Feel the kick of this Corpus shotgun as it shatters a high-yield crystal into anyone and anything standing in your way.
ExportWeapons.name: Exergis

ExportWeapons.description: A weapon that builds charge the more it kills. Hit capacity then release for an obliterating discharge of power.
ExportWeapons.name: Battacor

ExportWeapons.description: Corpus ingenuity leveraging Tau-tech to create a high-capacity bi-modal sniper weapon of terrifying capability. Zoom in to reduce recoil and add punch through. Zoom again to fire a bursting viral round, but with a lower rate of fire. Komorex features built-in ammo conversion.
ExportWeapons.name: Komorex

ExportWeapons.description: Nail them to the wall! The Stahlta automatic rifle propels hardened steel rods at high speed, while a charged fire mode fuses a number of volatile rods together for a large radioactive explosion.
ExportWeapons.name: Stahlta

ExportWeapons.description: Fires a photon beam that halts molecular vibrations, causing instant and painful freezing.
ExportWeapons.name: Glaxion

ExportWeapons.description: A cutting-edge, halogen-cooled electron accelerator capable of snap-freezing a target in moments.
ExportWeapons.name: Glaxion Vandal

ExportWeapons.description: This discreet rocket launcher is equally at home in a board meeting or on a casual outing. Aimed rockets are wire-guided for greater accuracy, but travel more slowly. The patented Granum Attaché System reloads the weapon when holstered.
ExportWeapons.name: Tenet Envoy

ExportWeapons.description: Once charged this Corpus laser cannon dispatches a devastating blast of light energy.
ExportWeapons.name: Opticor

ExportWeapons.description: With a precision crafted lens, this customized Opticor achieves a level of performance previously thought impossible.
ExportWeapons.name: Opticor Vandal

ExportWeapons.description: Bring negotiations to an instant conclusion with this Corpus assault rifle. Switch effortlessly between charged explosive shots and rapid-fire electrical assault mode.
ExportWeapons.name: Ambassador

ExportWeapons.description: When bathed in Void energy and prisma crystal, the simple Tetra becomes a beacon of style and intimidation.
ExportWeapons.name: Prisma Tetra

ExportWeapons.description: Drawing from its huge quad-chambered magazine, the Tetra is capable of unleashing a sustained barrage of lethal energy bolts.
ExportWeapons.name: Tetra

ExportWeapons.description: The Amprex rifle fires a continuous beam of high voltage electricity that arcs among nearby enemies. This weapon excels at Crowd Control.
ExportWeapons.name: Amprex

ExportWeapons.description:
Bolts from this Corpus bow deliver a one-two punch of an icy pulse, followed by a conventional explosion. Excess ammo picked up for other weapons will be converted into charges for the Lenz. 

Warning: Safety-protocols do not exist on this prototype.
ExportWeapons.name: Lenz

ExportWeapons.description: The explosive potential of the Lenz, enhanced with Prisma crystals.
ExportWeapons.name: Prisma Lenz

ExportWeapons.description: Alternate fire on this reengineered Plinx fires a projectile that pulls enemies close and then explodes. Its cooldown increases after the explosion to accommodate battery power demands.
ExportWeapons.name: Tenet Plinx

ExportWeapons.description: Parvos Granum's engineers have made this already ferocious hand cannon even more deadly with the addition of an alternate fire mode that empties an entire clip in one devastating burst.
ExportWeapons.name: Tenet Detron

ExportWeapons.description: This reengineered Cycron features a refracting energy disc that can split off the main target, hitting up to 2 additional nearby targets.
ExportWeapons.name: Tenet Cycron

ExportWeapons.description: Parvosian upgrade of the classic Tetra. Slower fire rate but with a larger magazine. Can now alt-fire entire clip as a large burst radius grenade launcher.
ExportWeapons.name: Tenet Tetra

ExportWeapons.description: Advances in microelectronics have improved a Corpus classic. Tenet Glaxion’s photon beam strikes up to four enemies at once. It also boasts superior Damage, Critical Chance, and Status Chance.
ExportWeapons.name: Tenet Glaxion

ExportWeapons.description: Sister-modified Flux Rifle with increased fire rate and range. Recharge has been replaced with ammo clips to accommodate greater power needs.
ExportWeapons.name: Tenet Flux Rifle

ExportWeapons.description: The expert engineers in Parvos Granum’s division have optimized the Ferrox’s lethal power.
ExportWeapons.name: Tenet Ferrox

ExportWeapons.description: Custom variant of a Corpus classic. Staggering blasts now ricochet and have greater range at the cost of a slower fire and reload speed. Surviving enemies are consumed with radiation.
ExportWeapons.name: Tenet Arca Plasmor

ExportWeapons.description: A customized version of the vicious Prova, with metallic finish and Lotus decal.
ExportWeapons.name: Prova Vandal

ExportWeapons.description: The Lanka fires a high velocity projectile through magnetic induction.
ExportWeapons.name: Lanka

ExportWeapons.description: The Dera is a repeater that fires super-heated plasma.
ExportWeapons.name: Dera

ExportWeapons.description: The Prova is a Melee Weapon that delivers a high-intensity shock to its target.
ExportWeapons.name: Prova

ExportWeapons.description: A customized version of the Dera, featuring a metallic finish and Lotus decal.
ExportWeapons.name: Dera Vandal

ExportWeapons.description: Laser Rifle with Corpus safe-guards removed.
ExportWeapons.name: Flux Rifle

ExportWeapons.description: While its intended design is for deep space construction, the concentrated laser beam of the Spectra is highly effective against organic and synthetic enemies.
ExportWeapons.name: Spectra
